{"id":839084413,"question_id":724,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1667873140,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/839084413/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int st =0, ed=nums.length-1;\n        int head = nums[st], tail=nums[ed];\n        while(st<ed){\n            \n            if(head==tail && ed-st==2)\n                return ed-1;\n            \n            \n            if(head>tail){\n                \n                ed--;\n                tail += nums[ed];\n            }else{\n                st++;\n                head += nums[st];\n            }\n        }\n        \n        if(head==tail)\n            return st;\n        else\n            return -1;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
